sentences.english: In the love of joys unknown.
sentences.chinese: 在人所不知的诸般喜悦的爱之中。

sentences.english: He lavished His grace on us with all wisdom and understanding.
sentences.chinese: 这恩典是神用诸般智慧聪明，充充足足赏给我们的。

sentences.english: Turn Thy face from my sins, and blot out all my iniquities .
sentences.chinese: 求你转面勿视我的罪恶，并抹去我的诸般愆尤。

sentences.english: And that he would shew thee the secrets of wisdom, that they are double to that which is!
sentences.chinese: 并将智慧的奥秘指示你，他有诸般的智识。

sentences.english: But though he cause grief, yet will he have compassion according to the multitude of his mercies.
sentences.chinese: 主虽使人忧愁，还要照他诸般的慈爱发怜悯。

sentences.english: The sword, then, over 100 soldier gentleman, the sort tool.
sentences.chinese: 剑者，再号百兵之君，赶过诸般利器。

sentences.english: The Lord will rescue me from every evil attack and will bring me safely to his heavenly kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 主必救我脱离诸般的凶恶，也必救我进他的天国。

sentences.english: He came over to welcome me and proselytize for the benefits of nudism.
sentences.chinese: 他走过来欢迎我，并介绍起天体主义的诸般好处。

definition: entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
Lin Xu (1875-1898), one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子[Wu4 xu1 Liu4 jun1 zi5] of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
